Text: Anydody has titles (ENG) for this? I have downloaded 20 subtitles, and they are all out of sync.  I also tried to offset them but because they are two files that messes things up (different length of avi files).  Anybody there who can help? Thanks!!
Thankyou so much! Beautiful Movie, and great Quality.
